page.title: 05TACKLEY SCHOOL
page.content: At Tackley School we have three class rooms. In{Class One}there are 25 children. Their teacher is Mrs Ellis. In{Class Two}there are 20 pupils. Their teacher is Mrs Walker and she is Deputy Head. {Class Three}has 23 pupils. Mr White, the head teacher, is their teacher. We have two play-times every day. The first is 20 minutes and the other half an hour. We have a concrete playground with{a netball pitch}marked on it,{a football field}and{a rounders {pitch.} The oldest in the school is Caroline Higgs who is 11 years old. For P.E. we have apparatus and rounders. Sometimes we have{drama and Class One has{cooking}on Fridays. We have six weeks{holiday}in summer and about three weeks at Christmas.
